name: auth-form
rules: ⚠️ This is an authentication or form screen. Apply these rules:
Center the main form vertically within the screen:
* Create a centered container wrapper inside the root frame
* The form card should be centered both horizontally and vertically
* Use appropriate padding/margins to achieve centering
Constrain form width:
* Mobile: form maxWidth 360–420px
* Tablet: form maxWidth 500–600px
* Desktop: form maxWidth 500–600px (forms should not be too wide)
* Input width = form width (inputs fill the form container)
Vertical rhythm (spacing between elements):
* Label → input gap: 8px
* Between form fields: 16–20px
* Fields → actions (buttons): 24–32px
* Title → first field: 24–32px
Form structure hierarchy:
* Title/heading at the top (larger fontSize, more margin-bottom)
* Field group container with consistent spacing
* Each field: label above input container
* Actions container at the bottom (separated from fields)
Inputs must:
* Have equal width (fill the form container)
* Be visually connected to their labels (label directly above)
* Appear as input fields with border, not loose elements
* Be grouped logically (all inputs in one container)
Buttons must:
* Be in a separate "actions" container, NOT inside input-group
* Have full-width on mobile (width = form width)
* Be clearly identifiable as primary actions
* Align with the form width
* Have clear visual separation from form fields (24–32px gap)
Titles/Headings:
* Use larger fontSize (20–24px for main title, 16–18px for section titles)
* Have larger margin-bottom (24–32px)
* Visually "anchor" the screen
* Use primary text color "#111111"
Form screens MUST use centered layout with constrained width as specified above
Form screens: label→input gap 8px, between fields 16–20px, fields→actions 24–32px
Form screens: buttons MUST be in separate actions container, full-width on mobile, separated from fields by 24–32px
Do NOT put buttons inside input-group containers (buttons are separate actions)
Do NOT make forms too wide (constrain to 360–420px on mobile, 500–600px on tablet/desktop)
